body_content.explanation: a material, especially leather made from cow skin, that has been made to look like the skin of a crocodile (= a large reptile with a hard skin that lives in and near rivers and lakes in hot, wet parts of the world) :
examples: Most mock croc is stamped cow leather.
Shoes are available in everything from yellow patent to green mock croc.

body_content.explanation: made from a material, especially leather made from cow skin, that has been made to look like the skin of a crocodile (= a large reptile with a hard skin that lives in and near rivers and lakes in hot, wet parts of the world):
examples: She was wearing a mock croc bomber jacket by Chanel.
The fashion chain is selling turquoise trench coats, check suits and mock croc accessories this season.
